participant_1.background:

I'm worried that my fantasies will get in the way of my new relationship.

content.text: Good morning! What's on your agenda for today?
I'm going to wake up early and meditate, then I'm not sure!
That's great! I'm an art teacher, and I'm excited to start my day with some creative time.
That sounds fun! I'm always looking for new ways to be creative.
I love to spend time with my nieces and nephews, and I also enjoy reading.
I love spending time with my cat, Oscar. He's my best friend.
I love cats! They're so cute and cuddly.
I once saw a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa!
Wow! That must have been an amazing experience!
It was! I'm so glad I got to see it.
I'm worried that my fantasies will get in the way of my new relationship.
I'm sure you can handle it! Just remember to focus on your partner and what's important to them.
You're welcome! Have a great day!
